summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Burton Place, from Elmore Street to Thurman Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, and side sewers, together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9504 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
